EmailTemplate.description: Set appointment via email, without talking on phone to customer
EmailTemplate.name: LEAD: SPANISH Setting Appointment via Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Schedule Your SunPower Appointment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in SunPower®. We are happy to help you schedule your appointment with a SunPower solar expert via email. Please note that your actual appointment will take place in-person, and during the consultation, you will receive a custom system design and proposal.
To help better prepare for this consultation, there are a few details that we’d like to confirm. Please reply back to this email or give us a call at 1-844-877-8676 with your responses to the following questions:
Are you the homeowner at {!Lead.Street}? Who is your current energy provider? What is your average monthly bill with them? What is your goal with going solar? How did you hear about SunPower? Are you interested in financing, leasing, or purchase?
* Please note that for financing the minimum credit score is 680 and for leasing is 650.
Together, let’s change the way our world is powered.
Thank you, Your Solar Advisor Team 1-844-877-8676 (1-844-US-SUNPOWER) SolarAdvisors@sunpower.com
